lessons.title: Introduction
lessons.content: Python is a high-level programming language used for a wide variety of applications. It's easy to learn and perfect for beginners.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Python has several data types, including integers, strings, and lists. Variables are used to store values.

lessons.title: Control Structures
lessons.content: Learn about if-else statements, loops, and how to control the flow of your programs.

lessons.title: Functions
lessons.content: Functions allow you to group reusable code into a block that can be called whenever needed.

lessons.title: Introduction
lessons.content: JavaScript is the language of the web. It is used to make websites interactive.

lessons.title: Variables
lessons.content: In JavaScript, variables are used to store data that can be used throughout your code.

lessons.title: Functions
lessons.content: Learn about functions in JavaScript and how to pass parameters.

lessons.title: Introduction
lessons.content: C++ is a powerful programming language known for its efficiency and control over system resources.

lessons.title: Variables
lessons.content: In C++, you define variables to store data in specific types, like integers, floats, or characters.

lessons.title: Introduction to App Development
lessons.content: Mobile app development involves creating applications for mobile devices using programming languages like Java and Swift.

lessons.title: User Interface Design
lessons.content: Learn about creating user-friendly interfaces for apps using design principles.

lessons.title: What is AI?
lessons.content: Artificial Intelligence refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn.

lessons.title: Machine Learning
lessons.content: Machine Learning is a subset of AI that involves training algorithms to learn from data.

lessons.title: Introduction to Game Development
lessons.content: Learn the basics of game development, including concepts like graphics, animation, and gameplay logic.

lessons.title: Unity Basics
lessons.content: Unity is a popular game engine used for building both 2D and 3D games. Learn about its interface and basic features.

lessons.title: Newton's Laws of Motion
lessons.content: Newton's laws describe the relationship between a body and the forces acting upon it.

lessons.title: Thermodynamics
lessons.content: Thermodynamics deals with the relationships between heat, work, and energy.

lessons.title: Cell Biology
lessons.content: Cells are the basic unit of life. This module will explore the structure and function of cells.

lessons.title: Genetics
lessons.content: Genetics is the study of heredity and variation in living organisms.

lessons.title: Atoms and Molecules
lessons.content: Atoms are the basic building blocks of matter. Molecules are made up of atoms bonded together.

lessons.title: Chemical Reactions
lessons.content: Chemical reactions involve the transformation of substances into different substances.

lessons.title: The Solar System
lessons.content: The solar system consists of the Sun and everything bound to it by gravity.

lessons.title: Stars and Galaxies
lessons.content: Learn about stars, their formation, and how galaxies are structured and evolve.
